members.name: Kyle Paris
members.bio: Led the team to Skills Champion at VEX Nationals. Coordinated all mechanical design efforts and competition strategy.

members.name: Sam Fallon
members.bio: Managed team operations and mentored new members. Built a collaborative and innovative team culture.

members.name: Jack Pregler
members.bio: Developed award-winning autonomous routines and control systems. Specialized in sensor integration and PID tuning.

members.name: Dylan Hansen
members.bio: Designed the Titan robot that won Design Award. Expert in CAD modeling, fabrication, and rapid prototyping.

members.name: Rishi Hancock
members.bio: Led the team to their first World Championship qualification. Pioneered the team's electronics and sensor systems.

members.name: Antonio Li
members.bio: Developed the Phoenix robot's autonomous capabilities. Key contributor to the team's software architecture.

members.name: Jackson Stepka
members.bio: Created the innovative X-drive holonomic system for Phoenix. Responsible for all CAD and technical documentation.

members.name: Matthew Cerza
members.bio: Managed robot assembly and fabrication. Established build processes that improved team efficiency.

_documentation.description: This file contains leadership history by year. Each year has its own leadership team.

structure.season: VEX game name or 'Current Season' for upcoming
structure.members: Array of leadership team members for that year

member_fields.name: Full name (use 'TBD' for unfilled positions)
member_fields.photo: Path to profile photo (use 'images/placeholder-avatar.svg' for TBD)
member_fields.year: Academic year when they held the position

tips: Add new years at the TOP of the leadership array
Use 'TBD' for positions not yet filled
Keep bios focused on achievements during that year
Profile photos should be square, min 400x400px
